actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Agriculture.

official_title: A bill to direct the Secretary of Agriculture to establish and maintain, through the facilities and personnel of the Agricultural Stabilization and Conservation Service and the Extension Service of the Department of Agriculture, a program designed to encourage individuals to engage in gardening activities.

summary.text: National Gardening Act - Directs the Secretary of Agriculture, through the Agricultural Stabilization and Conservation Service and the Extension Service, to establish and maintain a program whereunder county committees will lease for not more than $10 plots of land to individuals or groups to produce organic crops for their personal use.

titles.title: A bill to direct the Secretary of Agriculture to establish and maintain, through the facilities and personnel of the Agricultural Stabilization and Conservation Service and the Extension Service of the Department of Agriculture, a program designed to encourage individuals to engage in gardening activities.
